message.content:
I need to identify the line item that shows the increase in the amounts of tax accrued but not yet paid from the cash flow statement.

Looking at the cash flow statement provided, I see a line item called "Increase (Decrease) in Tax Payable" with a value of 1428630.43. 

Tax payable represents taxes that have been accrued but not yet paid, so an increase in this account indicates additional tax that has been accrued but not yet paid during the period.

Since the amount is positive (1428630.43), it represents an increase in tax payable, which is exactly what we're looking for - an increase in the amounts of tax accrued but not yet paid.

Therefore, the value I need to extract is 1428630.43.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '1428630.43'}}
```
